maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Cap, I'm back with the report!
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Cap', Je suis de retour, au rapport !

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: I see. Go on.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Je vois, continue.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: The initiation? A total cinch.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: L'initiation ? Un jeu d'enfant.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Here's the avatar - name's Lea.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Voici l'avatar - Son nom c'est Lea.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Aye... hard to miss that lass.\. Hope ye didn't run into everythin' with those horns there.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Aye... Difficile de rater cette fillette.\. J'espère que tu n'as pas esquinté mon navire de partout avec tes cornes.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Wait...\. don't tell me ya didn't notice the horns 'til now, Lea...
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Non attends...\. me dit pas que c'est qu'maintenant qu'tu t'en rends compte, Lea...

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Anyway, make sure ye clean up that mess ye started down in the cargo hold soon.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Peu importe, N'oubliez pas de ranger le bazar que vous avez mis dans la soute. Et rapidement.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Yes, Cap.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Oui, Capt'.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: I hope Sergey is satisfied.\. Is he around?
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: J'espère que Sergey est satisfait.\. Il est là ?

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Yeah, just give me a sec to set up your headset.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Oui, laisse-moi juste régler tes écouteurs.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Hello there, Jet!
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Bien le bonjour, Jet !

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: My good man! It's been a long time.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Mon bonhomme ! Ça faisait longtemps.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Indeed.\. You are still clinging to that jet pack, I see?
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Et oui.\. Toujours attaché à ton jetpack, je vois ?

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Ye know I'd never travel the sea without good ol' Betty.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Toi tu sais déjà que j'irais jamais en mer sans ma bonn' vielle Betty.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Anyway, I hope ye two will be ready to travel on soon.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: J'espère que vous deux vous êtes prêts à continuer votre voyage.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Having a darn avatar on board is just callin' for trouble.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Parce qu'avoir un satané Avatar à bord, c'est chercher les ennuis.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Of course.\. We will make this as brief as possible.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Bien sûr.\. On va faire aussi bref que possible.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Gee, Cap.\. What kinda welcome is that s'posed to be?
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Non mais, Cap'.\. C'est comme ça qu'on accueille les gens ?

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Besides, ain't we talkin' to Jet, former VRP dueling champ?
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Et n'est-on pas en train de parler à Jet, ancien champion de duels de VRP...

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: You keep telling us all about your combat moves from the old days.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: ... qui continue à nous raconter toutes ses techniques de combat infaillibles de l'époque ?

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: So here I thought maybe you'd want to give Lea a small combat lesson?
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Et moi qui pensais que tu aurais envie de donner une petite leçon de combat à Lea ?

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Ye're tellin' me that wee lass is up for a battle?
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Toi tu veux m'dire que cette demi-portion là est prête pour une petite bataille ?

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Oh, you bet she is!
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Oh, bien sûr qu'elle l'est !

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Like... she thrashes literally everything with a \c[1]single hit\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Surtout... elle fracasse littéralement tout en \c[1]un seul coup\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: What?
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Quoi ?

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Yeah...
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Oui...

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Right, we'll see about that.\. Just talk to me later t'day.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Bon, c'est ce qu'on verra.\. On en discute plus tard dans la journée.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Sweet!
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Chouette !

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Now then, ye're dismissed.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Bon, maintenant, rompez.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Ye can show the lass around the ship, but don't ye stir up any trouble.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Tu peux faire visiter mon navire à la fillette, mais n'allez pas faire de bêtises.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: Alright, Captain.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Bien sûr, Capitaine.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.orig: C'mon, Lea!\. It's time for some fresh air!
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/21/.text: Allez, Lea !\. Il est temps de respirer un peu d'air frais !

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.orig: This is no place for ye, lass.\. Go play somewhere else.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.text: Fillette, ce n'est pas fait pour toi ici.\. Va jouer ailleurs.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.orig: [nods]
There ye are.\. It's about darn time for yer combat lesson.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.text: Ah te voilà.\. Il est grand temps de faire ton entrainement au combat.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.orig: Ye ready?
[nods]
Good.\. Let's go to the balcony.
[shakes head]
Do ye still need to prepare yerself?\. I don't got all day, lass.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.text: Tu as encore besoin de te préparer ?\. J'ai pas toute la journée, fillette.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.orig: [Yes]
[No]
Didn't that boy want to spend time with you?
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.text: Ce jeune ne voulait pas s'occuper de toi ?

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.orig: Good day, Lass.
Carla is waitin' for you down in the cargo hold.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.text: Carla t'attend en bas dans la cale.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.orig: Everythin's prepared, so ye're ready to leave.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.text: Tout est prêt, donc maintenant tu es prête à partir.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.orig: [nods]
Good day, Lass.
Carla is waitin' for ye down in the cargo hold.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.text: Carla t'attend en bas dans la cale.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.orig: Everythin's prepared, so ye're ready to leave.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.text: Tout est prêt, donc maintenant tu es prête à partir.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.orig: [nods]
Good day, Lass. Back on the ship?
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.text: Bonne journée, fillette. De retour sur le navire ?

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.orig: [nods]
Ye're always welcome of course. But better not stay here for too long or people will get suspicious.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.text: Tu seras toujours la bienvenue, mais ne reste pas trop longtemps sinon les gens vont se poser des questions.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.orig: Hi!
Good day, Lass.\. Back on the ship?
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.text: Bonjour, fillette.\. De retour parmi nous ?

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.orig: Ye're always welcome of course.\. Just remember that most people on this ship are working.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.text: Tu serais toujours la bienvenue bien-sûr.\. Mais souviens toi que la plupart des gens sont au travail sur ce navire.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/23/.orig: [nods]

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.orig: Sorry, still busy with the radar. I'm afraid that won't change anytime soon.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.text: Désolé, mais le radar continue d'exiger toute mon attention.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.orig:
Is that blue guy still out there?\.
Seriously, we never had anything like this happen before.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.text:
Le type bleu est encore dehors ?\.
Sérieusement, il nous est jamais arrivé un truc comme ça.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.orig: You'd think they'd make sure players can't escape the playground or something.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.text: Moi qui pensais que tout était prévu pour qu'aucun joueur ne puisse sortir du Terrain de jeu.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.orig: Girl! Skip the chatting, will you? We have to hurry!
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.text: Lea ! Arrête de discuter et viens ici ! Il faut se dépêcher !

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.orig: Are you looking for the captain?
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.text: Est-ce que tu cherches le capitaine ?

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.orig: I think he's currently somewhere in the cabins.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.text: Je pense qu'il est quelque part dans les cabines.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.orig: Indeed, even a captain needs a break once in a while...
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.text: Et oui, même un capitaine a besoin d'une pause de temps en temps...

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.orig:
You're that avatar girl we were warned about, right?\.
Sorry, but I need to pay attention to the radar.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/24/.text:
C'est toi, la fille Avatar dont on nous a parlé, c'est ça ?\.
Désolé, mais je dois garder un œil sur le radar.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/32/.orig: It's still on the radar, approaching us at high velocity.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/32/.text: Il est encore sur le radar et s'approche de nous à grande vitesse.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/32/.orig: No transmission, no darn ship to see.\. What's goin' on here?
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/32/.text: Aucune transmission, aucun bateau en vue.\. Tonnerre de Brest ! Qu'est-ce qui se passe ?
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/32/.note: should find another haddock quote not referencing an actual place ... but on the other hand

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/32/.orig: Captain! I think I caught it on satellite! You gotta see this!
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/32/.text: Capitaine ! Je crois que je l'ai sur le satellite ! Il faut que vous voyiez ça !

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.orig: That Carla...\. orderin' me around like that.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.text: Cette Carla...\. comment elle me donne des ordres...

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.orig: I gotta remind her who's in charge on this ship sometime...
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.text: Il faudrait que je lui rappelle qui est le responsable ici...

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.orig: Lass, ye really seem to be in low spirits...
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.text: Fillette, tu ne dois vraiment pas aller bien...

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.orig: But I really have no time for strollin' around right now.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.text: Mais en ce moment je n'ai pas vraiment le temps de me balader.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.orig: Do you mind if I borrow Ms. Avatar for a moment?
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.text: Est-ce que ça vous dérange si je vous emprunte Madame Avatar pendant un moment ?

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.orig: No, that'd be just perfect! Please, keep the lass busy!
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.text: Non, bien au contraire ! Occupez là un peu !

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.orig: Nice!\. Please come this way, Ms. Avatar!
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.text: Cool !\. S'il te plait, par ici, Madame Avatar !

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.orig: I never expected to see you on this ship again, Ms. Avatar!
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.text: Je m'attendais pas du tout à vous revoir sur ce navire, Madame Avatar !

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.orig: Huh? Do you want me to call you by your first name?
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.text: Huh ? Est-ce que tu veux que je t'appelle par ton prénom ?

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.orig: Anyway, I'll go ahead and get everyone together!
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.text: Bon, je vais aller prévenir les autres !

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.orig: Just meet me outside, down on the \c[3]deck\c[0]!
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.text: Viens me voir dehors, en bas sur le \c[3]pont principal\c[0] !
Enfin on va pouvoir faire l'\c[3]expérience\c[0] !!

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.orig: Meet the cargo crew member at the \c[3]deck of M.S. Solar\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/34/.text: Parlez aux membres de l'équipage sur le \c[3]pont principal du M.S. Solar\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/35/.orig: My colleague should be waiting on the deck for you.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/35/.text: Mon collègue doit t'attendre sur le pont principal.

maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/35/.orig: I'm supposed to wait up here.
Well... you'll see.\. They have a lot of things planned.
maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json/entities/35/.text: Ben... tu verras.\. Ils t'ont préparé plein de trucs.
